channel.title: Art Practice on Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content in Art Practice on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: Hands drawing practice
item.description: I keep practicing with charcoal. I’m gradually trying to move from still life to anatomy starting with hands and feets. Also have a lot to do to improve the charcoal usage itself and master the material. #brushray #artbrushray #artist #art #painting #artcommissions #buyart #art #tradtitional #charcoal #hands #anatomy #forart Like my work? Feel free to contact me ✉ for your personalized piece of art anytime!

item.title: Blacksmiths art by brushray
item.description: Character drawing practice. item.title: Flowers with charcoal
item.description: Flowers driven with charcoal powder. Still life by Dmitry Brushray

item.title: Still life practice
